pkgmetadata.longdescription: Productivity and Efficiency Analysis using DEA // Measure productivity and efficiency using Data Envelopment Analysis (DEA). Available methods include DEA under different technology assumptions, bootstrapping of efficiency scores and calculation of the Malmquist productivity index. Analyses can be performed either in the console or with the provided 'shiny' app. See Banker, R.; Charnes, A.; Cooper, W.W. (1984) doi:10.1287/mnsc.30.9.1078, Fre, R.; Grosskopf, S. (1996) doi:10.1007/978-94-009-1816-0.
